attributes.action: ban facebook and all similar social information databasing websites.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I seek your signature on this petition in order to show support for my genuine proposal that Facebook.com is detrimental to local community and our society in general and that government should pass a law preventing or limiting the use of such a website.

My reasoning for such a proposal is thus: 

They nurture bigoted groups that operate on a myopic and acrimonious basis. 
They hinder socio-physical interaction and relationships particularly between introverts.
They cause disassociation of factual significance by discouraging independent investigation. 
They cause unsubstantiable and erratic misapprehensions which can lead to depression and/or grandiose delusions in the user. 
They promote superficial debate. 
Lastly, pedophile rings are shown to freely exchange personal information on children with such sites.

rejection.details: Like books, the PM does not have the power to ban individual websites. If you have concerns about the content on Facebook we suggest you contact the police.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
